org.jdesktop.jdic.misc
Class MusicPlayer

java.lang.Object
  org.jdesktop.jdic.misc.MusicPlayer

public class MusicPlayer
extends java.lang.Object

This class interfaces with the users default music player to control it (launch, start, stop, switch tracks, get current artist, etc.) It does not embed a music player into your java app, it just controls music player from another process.

Author:
Joshua Marinacci joshua@marinacci.org
